doc:
Vonetta McGee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vonetta_McGee 0 Vonetta Lawrence McGee (January 14, 1945 – July 9, 2010) was an American actress. She is best known for her roles during the 1970s, which included blaxploitation films such as Hammer, Melinda, Blacula, Shaft in Africa, Detroit 9000 and 1974's Thomasine Bushrod alongside her then-boyfriend Max Julien. She was a regular on the 1987 Universal Television situation comedy Bustin' Loose, starring as Mimi Shaw for its only season (1987–88). Vonetta_Lawrence_McGee ( January_14_,_1945 – July_9_,_2010 ) was an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_roles during the_1970s , which included blaxploitation_films such_as Hammer , Melinda , Blacula , Shaft in Africa , Detroit_9000 and 1974 's_Thomasine_ alongside her_then-boyfriend_Max_Julien . She was a_regular on the_1987_Universal_Television_situation_comedy_Bustin '_Loose , starring as Mimi_Shaw for its_only_season_(_1987 – 88_) .
